description: The Head son of the Eris Sword Clan, Calm and reserved. Responsible for the safety of the Roland royal family. Instrumental in Sion`s rise to power. Killed his own parents to save his sisters. Also made contracts with over 1000 demons to gain near limitless power. The other 1/2 reincarnation of the demon lord "The Lonely one". Has an unnatural love for his sister Ferris.
name: Lucille Eris
